alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe; Halifax; Vance; Warren (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 9:14PM EDT until May 06 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Vance County in central North Carolina... Warren County in central North Carolina... Edgecombe County in central North Carolina... Halifax County in central North Carolina... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 913 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Dortches, or 11 miles north of Rocky Mount, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rocky Mount, Roanoke Rapids, Henderson, Tarboro, Warrenton, Halifax, Scotland Neck, Norlina, Littleton and Enfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for central North Carolina. Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for central North Carolina.
